attributes.action: The people of the UK welcome a State visit by Donald Trump
attributes.additional_details: An inspection of the current petition against the visit by Donald Trump shows that people are voting from countries other than the UK so it is not representative of what the people that live in the UK want.
attributes.background: Many people from countries other than the UK have signed the petition to prevent Donald Trump paying a State visit to the UK.  This petition is intended to show that the people OF the UK/Great Britain welcome a visit by Donald Trump.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844

British citizens living outside the UK can start and sign petitions on this site.
